content: the lemon peel hat is such a fun and easy hat and will be your go-to hat when needing to make a quick and pretty crochet hat it comes with links to 3 video tutorials for each part of the hat what are you waiting for make yourself a pretty lemon peel hat with faux fur pom-pom **the pattern is free on my website you can also purchase an ad-free printer-friendly pdf here ** > please add the pattern to your ravelry > favorites list for each reference
